i.name: Crystal Spires
i.description: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.

q.name: Crystal Slash
q.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.

w.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
w.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.

e.name: Fracture
e.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.

r.name: Impale
r.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.

i1.name: Crystal Spires
i1.blurb: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.
i1.description: {{sbc|Crystal Spires:}} '''Skarner's''' presence causes a number of ''Crystal Spires'' to appear at set points on the battlefield, which can be captured by {{tip|champions}} who stand near them for 2 seconds. Once captured, ''Crystal Spires'' are owned until contested and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.
i1.description2: ''Crystal Spires'' grant {{g|30}} split among its captors upon being captured, or {{g|15}} if only a single champion participated in its capture, and provide {{tip|sight}} around them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds upon being captured, becoming impossible to recapture for 15 seconds.
i1.description3: {{sbc|Crystal Charge:}} While within range of a ''Crystal Spire'' controlled by his team, or while an enemy is {{tip|stun|stunned}} with {{ai|Fracture|Skarner}} or {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} with {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}, '''Skarner''' gains {{pp|18|70|72|74|76|78|80|82|85|88|91|94|97|100|104|108|112|116|120|formula = 68 + 2 per level up to 7, + 3 per level up to 13, and + 4 per level|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{pp|18|key=%|43|48|53|58|63|68|73|80|87|94|101|108|115|124|133|142|151|160|formula = 38 + 5 per level up to 7, + 7 per level up to 13, and + 9 per level|color=as}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and restores {{sti|mana|{{as|2% '''maximum''' mana}}}} every second.
notes: * ''Crystal Spire'' distribution is as follows:
** {{sbc|Six}} in [[Summoner's Rift]]
*** One beside {{uis|Baron Nashor}} pit
*** One beside {{uis|Dragon}} pit
*** One nearby each {{ui|Red Brambleback}}
*** One nearby each {{ui|Blue Sentinel}}
** {{sbc|Five}} in [[Twisted Treeline]]
*** One within {{uis|Vilemaw}} pit
*** One nearby each {{ui|Golem}}
*** One nearby each {{ui|Giant Wolf}}
** {{sbc|Five}} in [[Howling Abyss]]
*** One in each brush
*** One in each team's base (below each inhibitor)

* The ''Crystal Spires'' near {{ui|Baron Nashor}}, {{ui|Dragon}}, {{ui|Vilemaw}}, and the central brush in [[Howling Abyss]] begin the game as neutral and can only be captured after minions spawn (1:30) and onwards.
** All other spires begin as either allied or enemy (depending on position) but can be captured as soon as the game starts.
* No additional ''Crystal Spires'' are spawned in [[One for All]] or mirrored matches
** Every ally ''Skarner'' will receive the bonuses so long as the ''Crystal Spires'' are in allied control.

riot.name: Crystal Slash
riot.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
riot.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ f1 }} physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Basic attacks against non-structures lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds (quadrupled against champions).

q1.name: Crystal Slash
q1.blurb: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies in range.
q1.description2: If an enemy is hit, subsequent uses of ''Crystal Slash'' within 4 seconds deal {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.
q1.leveling2: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|33 to 45}}% AD}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{as|{{ap|33*2 to 45*2}}% AD}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
q1.description3: Basic attacks against non-structures reduce ''Crystal Slash's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{fd|0.25}} seconds, quadrupled to 1 against enemy champions.
notes: * ''Crystal Slash'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Skarner's'' previous orders.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but will not prevent ''Skarner'' from triggering the bonus effect.

riot.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
riot.description: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.
riot.tooltip: Skarner is shielded for {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of his maximum health) (+{{ a1 }}) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains movement speed that ramps up to {{ e5 }}% over 3 seconds.

w1.blurb: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.
w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' {{tip|shields}} himself for up to 6 seconds, gaining initial {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that accelerates by 100% over 3 seconds while the shield holds.

riot.name: Fracture
riot.description: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.
riot.tooltip:
Passive: Crystallizing enemies with Fracture and Impale grants Crystal Charge for the disable duration and reduces the cooldown of Fracture by the same amount.

Active: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing targets hit by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds and reducing the blast's speed.

Enemies hit by Fracture are afflicted with Crystal Venom for {{ e6 }} seconds, causing Skarner's next basic attack against them to deal {{ e2 }} additional physical damage and stun the target for {{ e3 }} second.

e1.name: Fracture
e1.blurb: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.
e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' launches a blast of energy in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, as well as marking them with {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} for 5 seconds. ''Fracture's'' projectile slows down every time it hits an enemy.
e1.description2: '''Skarner's''' next basic attack against a target marked with {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} consumes the mark to deal them {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|stun}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.
e1.description3: Every time he {{tip|stun|stuns}} a target with ''Fracture'' or {{tip|suppression|suppresses}} an enemy with {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}, ''Fracture's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by the corresponding duration of the disable.
notes: * '''Fracture''' will be disabled during {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}.

* '''POSSIBLE BUG''': {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} will be consumed but deal no damage or apply the {{tip|stun}} if {{ci|Skarner}} is {{tip|blind|blinded}} / the attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} or {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}.
** The attack will be blocked and counted as a {{tip|immobilize}} effect for {{cai|Riposte|Fiora}}.

riot.name: Impale
riot.description: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.
riot.tooltip: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for {{ rduration }} seconds, dealing <physicalDamage>{{ physicaldamage }}</physicalDamage> physical damage plus <magicDamage>{{ magicdamage }}</magicDamage> magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt the same damage again.

r1.name: Impale
r1.blurb: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.
r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' rears his stinger and brings it down, {{tip|root|rooting}} the target enemy for {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds, dealing {{as|60% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}, {{as|magic damage}}, and {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds. At the end of the duration, the target takes the same damage again.
r1.leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 100 3}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 100*2 3}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 100*2 3}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ 120% AD)}}}}
r1.description2: For the duration, '''Skarner''' can move freely and drag his victim around with him but cannot attack them.
notes: * The target will not take ''Impale's'' secondary damage if the suppression is removed ({{nie|Quicksilver}}, {{ai|Remove Scurvy|Gangplank}}).

* ''Impale'' is canceled (but does not go on cooldown) if ''Skarner'' loses sight of his target or if they exceed a range threshold (whether by being mid-dash, removing the root and backing away, or ''Skarner'' being displaced) during the initial {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds.
* ''Skarner's'' target will follow him around regardless of how they move (walking, dashing, {{ai|Buster Shot|Tristana}}, {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}}).

* While ''Impale's'' suppression is active, and for the purposes of direction-conditioned abilities ({{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}, {{ai|Mocking Shout|Tryndamere}}) ''Skarner'' is considered to be facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing.
